alert.note: Alert for Ben Hill; Irwin; Turner (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 01 at 2:10PM EDT until April 01 at 3:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Irwin County in south central Georgia... Northeastern Turner County in south central Georgia... Ben Hill County in south central Georgia... * Until 315 PM EDT. * At 210 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles northeast of Ashburn, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fitzgerald, Ashburn, Ocilla, Mystic, Rebecca, Lulaville, Amboy, Osierfield, Ashton, Irwinville, Fitzgerald Municipal A/P, Irwinville Airport, Wray, Bowens Mill, Red Bluff, Arp, Abba and Queensland. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
